description: Extraction schema for Odoo sales order date information

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the sales order in Odoo

order_date.description: Order date from sale.order.date_order. Accepts common datetime strings (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS', 'YYYY-MM-DD', or ISO 8601). No strict ISO 8601 requirement.

notes.validation: Datetime strings are accepted in multiple common formats. ISO 8601 is supported but not required.
